title: Justice Rising: Live Conference
content:
Architects & Engineers for 9/11 Truth is thrilled to present “ Justice Rising , ” an online conference on the @ @ @ @ @ and the destructive trajectory of the post-9/11 world .
The conference will run from Friday @ @ @ @ @ Sunday , September 13 , marking the 19th anniversary of the day that changed our @ @ @ @ @ conference will go for three hours each day and will be open to all free @ @ @ @ @ expressed by speakers outside of AE911Truth are the opinions of those individuals alone .
